Articles.Content:
> 
> We HAVE to get to 300 pages before release so we can be proud of ourselves and have a nice story to tell our grandchildren. Come on people!!!!!

Oh you can definitely feel the acceleration from North/Central/South America waking up!

> 
> Ill go catch a few hours of afternoon sleep, to be ready for a long night ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

It's only morning here, yay for timezones!

> 
> We HAVE to get to 300 pages before release so we can be proud of ourselves and have a nice story to tell our grandchildren. Come on people!!!!!

This all depends on when they release it right? If it gets released in 20 minutes then we won't make it. If it's 3 or 4 or 8 more hours we stand a good chance.

> 
> Wish granted. Release is delayed by 2 months

NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! \*head explodes\*

Wait, guys, I bet the devs are waiting for us to hit 300 to release it....

FASTER!!!!
I don't think 1.0 will be here till afternoon Squad time, *but*, there's always the possibility that it could happen earlier.

[https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/)

Is down for Server migration, it's happening ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Wait, guys, I bet the devs are waiting for us to hit 300 to release it....
> FASTER!!!!

Ha ha ha, you just incited panic!

> 
> I said it was different a while ago because it was at the time. I opened my phone and browser at the same time, did a google search on both at the same time and clicked on the main page at the same time.
> They just like 2 minutes ago switched the browser version back to text.

It has these formatting marks which apparently didn't take on the safari browser for some reason.

> 
> [https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/)
> Is down for Server migration, it's happening ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

It's been down for migration for a while now...

> 
> [https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/)
> Is down for Server migration, it's happening ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Uhhh the background is changed! Now with 100x stars

> 
> [https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/)
> Is down for Server migration, it's happening ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

It's been down since yesterday.
with this pace we'll be at 300 within an hour

> 
> Uhhh the background is changed! Now with 100x stars

No, it's in text.
What is going on, every time I post I start a new page (4 in a row), I am locked into the hype wave!

> 
> Uhhh the background is changed! Now with 100x stars

No it didn't.

Might be different browser though.

> 
> No, it's in text.

*No*, it's in images.

> 
> We HAVE to get to 300 pages before release so we can be proud of ourselves and have a nice story to tell our grandchildren. Come on people!!!!!

Being proud of reaching 300 pages before release so you can have a nice story

having grandchildren

pretty sure you can have one or the other but not both...

For those of you on Steam, be advised that you can set KSP to be a "High Priority" download to update ASAP.

1. From your games library, right click on KSP

2. Click Properties

3. Click the Updates tab

4. Change "Always keep this game up to date" to "High Priority - Always auto-update this game before others"
New Page! Wah wah...

> 
> *No*, it's in images.

What browser are you using?
I have to go. But I'll leave one last post here on the way to 300 (maybe)
Background has changed for me too, wohoo!
Only 45 pages to go!

> 
> *No*, it's in images.

Text made out of pictures. Best text.

But anyway, it's showing the standard pictureless background for me.
